summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for payment of certain costs and expenses incurred by various City Departments in 1975; increasing expenditure allowances by reappropriation and transfer, making appropriations from the Central Freeway Municipal Garage Improvement Fund (1972) and from the Sewer Fund, making reimbursable appropriations from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor, and ratifying and confirming prior expenditures.
